Windlord/Termitron::

"I'll go..." said the Hawk "Termitron... "

The insect-bot came in the ship and  Windlord sayd him
"Take care our friends..." He added "I have to go where Aerotaur is 
and return... cya I'll be back soon"

The bug-bot did a militar greeting and he go to the door to started 
act as if he was a soldier in guard.

"Perplex...take care of all" said Windlord and quickly he ran out 
side and he took off in order to arrive at the place wher Aerotaur 
was watting him



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "It seems that you are among other friends.  I will go now.  
The three of 
> you are welcome to come with me.  We have two youngsters in our 
group too."  
> He sends a message to Windlord.  "Hey Windlord do you mind coming 
and guiding 
> me to the new place?  I'll meet you in the clearing where the 
transmission 
> originated."
